text: walmwmnwn aladhin jahaduu 'aeda'an allh, walnfs, walshytan, wasabaruu ealaa alftn waladha fi sabil allh, sayahdihim allah subul alkhyr, wythbthm ealaa alsirat almstqym, wman hadhih sfth fahu muhsin 'iilaa nafsih wa'iilaa ghyrh. wa'iina allah subhanah wteala lamae man 'ahsan min khalqih balnsrt waltayyd walhfz walhdayt
